overview:
One of the founders of Driver Digital, David Feuerstein has established himself as a driving force in strategic business development, with a focus on web technology and online media. He plays a central role in DRIVER Digital’s growth, partnerships and strategy.

From 2007 to 2011, David served as Vice President for Business Development at Conduit.com, where he was instrumental in securing strategic relationships with the likes of MLB, MTV, Time Warner, Yahoo!, Groupon, Mozilla, Coca-Cola, LinkedIn, Grooveshark, NHL.com and many other leading properties and technologies. He thrives in the digital media space, working with creative advertising and marketing, and forging paths of social targeting coupled with branded functionality.

David was also part of the founding team at Deltathree.com a pioneer in the Voice Over IP space, and in the course of his career has helped numerous technology and Internet companies refine business strategy, execute plans, and raise funds.

His broad experience of the last 5-7 years has built a strong network of colleagues in print, music, film and other entertainment media, as well as in professional sports, technology world and Consumer Brand world.

Lately his online focus has been in the digital media space working with both creative advertising and marketing, driving campaigns that offer high levels of targeted social engagement and brand awareness, coupled with functionality.

David holds a BA from the University of California at San Diego, and lives in Jerusalem with his wife and three children.
